summary: This is an email from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team manager, Teresa Rodelo, to an unspecified recipient, transmitting Amazon's response to a subpoena or law enforcement request related to case CRIM 1071168 2020 DS and Subpoena 20 Mag. 6216. The response includes a spreadsheet with redacted titles of expressive materials, and Amazon asserts objections regarding the volume and burden of the request.

persons.name: Teresa Rodelo
persons.role: Manager, Law Enforcement Response Team at Amazon.com, Inc.
persons.context: She is the sender of the email, transmitting Amazon's formal response to a law enforcement subpoena or request, and asserting legal objections on behalf of Amazon.

events.title: Amazon Submits Response to Law Enforcement Request
events.description: Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team sends a response, including a spreadsheet, to a subpoena or law enforcement request related to case CRIM 1071168 2020 DS and Subpoena 20 Mag. 6216. The response redacts titles of expressive materials and raises objections about the request's volume and burden.

keyFacts: Amazon received a law enforcement request or subpoena related to case CRIM 1071168 2020 DS and Subpoena 20 Mag. 6216.
Amazon's response, sent by manager Teresa Rodelo, included a spreadsheet but redacted the titles of 'expressive materials' for privacy and legal reasons.
Amazon formally objected to the request, stating it was 'unusually voluminous' and would cause 'an undue burden' on the company.
